column1: Little Goat Diner////So far I've tasted the Goat Sloppy Joe
column6: and blood orange meringue pie.  Mac and cheese was underwhelming but the Drowned and the Wing-style burger really stood out and made the meal.  I've had better fried pickles (ahem
